name: Spell Reactor - AZI
text: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Reactor" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Spell Reactor - AZI" once per turn. Once per turn, if your opponent activates a Spell Card or effect: You can negate that effect, and if you do, set that card to your Spell & Trap zone. If you activate a Spell Card owned by your opponent: Inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.
